r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $143.0K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with RATIO ARCHITECTURE INTERIOR DESIGN. The average
  contract duration was 1.65 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $301.5K. The longest
  contract was 3.7 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $959.1K.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '143.0K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '20'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '13'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '65%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '455%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.46'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '3.0M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.65'
s421_mean_contract_value: '301.5K'
s425_max_duration: '3.7'
s422_max_contract_value: '959.1K'
